title: Boots
description: Willem's father never approved of his artistic talents, his choices in life, or the fact that he's gay. When the only thing Horst leaves to his son is the family cat, Willem thinks it's his fatherâ€™s last insult from the grave. That is, until the cat starts talking to him.Though Willem's lost his boyfriend, his home, and his job, Kasha, who claims to be a magic cat, reassures him that all will be well. All he needs is Willemâ€™s trust and a good pair of boots. But giving boots to a talking cat has unexpected consequences when odd events ambush Willem at every turn, such as the appearance of a handsome stranger in his arms at night.While Willem begins to suspect Kasha's plans might be dangerous for all involved, how can he distrust such a charming kitty in cowboy boots? Gay / Fantasy / Fairy Tale / Shapeshifter / Witchcraft / Magic
author: Angel  Martinez
